projects.name: SpeedID
projects.description: Speed ID is an apps that can give you various apps about smart city. Everything apps you need is here, like a queue, food, parking, sales, letter and much more. In this Apps you can collect all about your profile and you can share your profile with a CR Code.

projects.name: Speed Parking
projects.description: Speed Parking is a tools to help manage the parking in your area. The parking man can record the incoming and outgoing vehicles quickly and by that time the data has entered the parking area manager. The parking man can print parking receipt with bluetooth printer so as to create a parking system that is accountable and efficient.
